tasks.name: title
tasks.prompt: Please generate a title with at most 10 words for this image, describing the main subject, scene, or content. The title should be a single sentence.

tasks.name: description
tasks.prompt: Please describe this image in a single paragraph with 100-150 words. The description may include the main objects, scene, colors, composition, atmosphere and other visual elements.

tasks.name: keywords
tasks.prompt: Generate 5-10 keywords for this image, separated by commas, describing the theme, style, content, etc.
